word:
In all these cases well-directed physical exercise would prove an effective remedial agent. In some cases it is indispensable to the recovery of health. The will goes with the labor of the hands; and what these invalids need is to 


                                                        735 

have the will aroused. When the will is dormant, the imagination becomes abnormal, and it is impossible to resist disease.--MH 239 (1905).
